title: CUSTOM : Guitar Hero 3 ( Rock Band Edition )  PROPER
description:
This is the PROPER version of my GH3/Rock Band Custom.  There is another version on here (that i didn&#039;t upload myself), which i DID make.  But it&#039;s an early version and doesn&#039;t have all the DLC songs as stated in the description. And the person who uploaded the other included the WRONG nfo.  This one, is uploaded by me and you WILL get all the songs in the description.



Guitar Hero 3 Custom - Rock Band Edition - by CosmoKramer

ALL DIFFICULTIES
GUITAR ONLY - NO BASS 

Includes every Rock Band Song from the mainsetlist, 4 of the bonus songs, 21 DLC songs, and The Devil Went Down To Geogia  from the GH3 Xbox DLC.  This is the OFFICIAL Rock Band songs with the same exact audio from the actual game.  The guitar cuts off if you miss a note.  The crowd sings along on some songs just like in the game.  The guitarist animations actually go with the song (take a look when your playing) and moves his hand, and stops when there is no music.  

Enjoy.

NOTE: LOWER THE "BAND" VOLUME TO ABOUT 7 OR SO IN THE AUDIO OPTIONS FOR BEST SOUND. Or make the "Band" volume two lower than the guitar... If your Guitar Volume is 9...then make the Band Volume 7.  Experiment for best sound.
